Alt_XP_Booster_Auto.help: This power provides +25% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 25%.

Pack_Mentality_Lock.help: While this power is active you cannot gain Pack Mentality!

Alt_50_percent_XP_Booster_1_hour.help: This power provides +50% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 50%.

Alt_50_percent_XP_Booster_4_hour.help: This power provides +50% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 50%.

Alt_50_percent_XP_Booster_8_hour.help: This power provides +50% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 50%.

Alt_50_percent_Shared_XP_Booster_Auto_1_.help: This power gives you a 50% XP Bonus for 1 hour! While this effect is in place you cannot benefit from or claim any other XP Booster power.

Alt_50_percent_Shared_XP_Booster_Auto_4_.help: This power gives you a 50% XP Bonus for 4 hours! While this effect is in place you cannot benefit from or claim any other XP Booster power.

Alt_50_percent_Shared_XP_Booster_Auto_8_.help: This power gives you a 50% XP Bonus for 8 hours! While this effect is in place you cannot benefit from or claim any other XP Booster power.

Alt_Super_XP_Booster_1_hour.help: This power provides +100% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 100%.

Alt_Super_XP_Booster_4_hour.help: This power provides +100% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 100%.

Alt_Super_XP_Booster_8_hour.help: This power provides +100% Experience Point gain. While this power is active, Influence gain will be reduced by 100%.

enhanced_water_jet_lock.help: This power is placed on you immediately after casting an enhanced Water Jet. While this power is active you cannot use an enhanced version of Water Jet.
enhanced_water_jet_lock.targetHelp: This power is placed on you immediately after casting an enhanced Water Jet. While this power is active you cannot use an enhanced version of Water Jet.
